common_2020_ghost_010_ghost_01:
[BD06:0]Well, if it isn’t my little challenger,
[trnm:0]![npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_010_ghost_02:
What brings you back here, baby? Finally ready
for that rap battle?[npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_010_select_01: I’m here for the Gym inspection!
common_2020_ghost_010_select_02: Yeah! A rap battle sounds great!
common_2020_ghost_010_ghost_03a:
Hold on. You’re telling me La Primera sent YOU
to check on my Gym?![npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_010_ghost_03b: Hah! So you’re a Champion Rank comedian too![npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_010_ghost_04: So instead of her, I get you...[npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_010_ghost_05:
She sent a rookie Champion instead of comin’
out here herself?\c
Doesn’t she know who I am?![npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_010_ghost_06:
Sorry, I got heated there. Don’t worry, though—
you aren’t the one who struck that nerve.[npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_010_ghost_07:
Oh well. I was just thinkin’ I’d like to see you
again anyway. Guess this is just how fate has it![npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_010_ghost_08:
If we’re doin’ this, let’s do it. Ready to show me
how strong all those adventures made you?[npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_010_ghost_retry:
You ready to show me how strong you are
now, [trnm:0]?[npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_010_ghost_09:
Now THAT’s the spirit! C’mon, let’s put on a
killer show![npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_010_ghost_10:
No? Then what’d you come here for? Come back
when you’re ready to go![npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_010_ghost_nobattle:
Hey now! You’re gonna need at least two
Pokémon in battlin’ shape to take me on![npcn:1B]
